item.title: Loading, Merging and Joining Datasets
item.description: This is the minimal coding necessary to assemble various data feeds and sort out the likes of variables naming & new features creation plus some general housekeeping tasks. It includes general housekeeping tasks like sorting variables names, creating essential features and sorting out variables order I will continue to add to this code should the need arise for other features to be created. THE DATASET library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(readr) The dataset Iâ€™m using here accompanies a Redbooks publication called Building 360-Degree Information Applications which is available as a free PDF download.
